text: What is the best way to write HTML from Python?

I have figured out how to extract the information I need from a PDF file using PDFMiner in Python, and now I need to write out a modified version of the document with only the information that's needed as an HTML file.
The new version will be archived online to a repository, and a printed copy shipped with the unit.
What is the best way to write this document (a header, a logo, and a table with parameters and pass/fail limits) from Python?
Or is there a better, newer Python package?
I can write my own package to write HTML, but surely someone else has done this already.
